pageContext.collection_description: Consists mainly of scripts along with budgets, treatments, correspondence, research materials, contracts, outlines and synopses for many of the radio, television and motion pictures written or produced by Niss, plus professional correspondence, two scrapbooks, 94 phonograph records, an audio tape for Twenty-first Precinct, 1954-1955, one phonograph record for Gang Busters, 1954, material related to Charlie Wild, Private Detective and other television and film related material.
